    About me

    I'm Thi, a Vietnamese Data Scientist who has a curious mind. As an never-stop-learning worm, I am interested in researching and sharing contents about Applied Mathematics and Data Science. I have a Ph.D. degree in Applied Mathematics at U. Sorbonne Paris Nord and a very enthusiastic self-learner in Data Science.

    I use this website to document everything I've learned while going through the process of learning and working in this field.

    Web Developer & Data Scientist

    Ideta , 2/2021 â€” ongoing

    Ideta is a solution that allows companies to create very easily conversational assistants on many communication channels such as Messenger, SMS, Slack, Wechat, Skype business, ... but also voice like Google Home. The solution makes the creation of chatbots accessible to everyone.
    My role is to understand how things work in both backend and frontend, then integrate some self-built Natural Language Processing services to the main platform.

    Researcher in Applied Maths & Coder

    U. Sorbonne Paris Nord , 2013 â€” 2018

    I researched into the growth of biofilm by using the Finite Element Method, a numerical analysis method. The thesis's title is "Finite Element Methods for nonlinear interface problems. Application to a bioï¬lm growth model". For the implementation, I used FreeFem++ and a self-built NXFEM toolbox.
